name: You Green Elephant
description: You Green Elephant - a classic retro first-person shooter, filled with references, banter and thrash in every pixel of the exciting action.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Процессор: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Оперативная память: 2048 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 65 MB
